page.title: 08Events E.K. Festival.
page.content: Every year we have a Greenhills Festival held at Ballerup High School. Sometimes there is a celebrity who opens the festival.There are floats advertising organizations.There is a lot of competitions people can enter for example"Beat the Goalie""Knock the Coconut down"and also "Throw the wellie".There are displays of Karate and Judo that let the public see the art of defence.There are also pony rides and very good prizes to be won and people never go away from the festival empty handed.Last year people had to through six dice and get six, sixes to win a Ford Fiesta. The public can buy plants.There is a local band that play songs that have been in the charts years back.Over all it is a good day out.
